TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

Docs.summary: Represents detailed update information obtained through a call to .

remarks.format:
## Remarks With <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs>, you can decide whether to upgrade your ClickOnce application based on information about the newest version. <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.UpdateAvailable%2A> will return a Boolean value indicating whether there is a new update at all. The <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.AvailableVersion%2A> property provides the version number of the new version, while <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.MinimumRequiredVersion%2A> provides the earliest version that the user should have installed on the computer. <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.IsUpdateRequired%2A> expresses whether the latest available update is required of the user. Finally, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.UpdateSizeBytes%2A> expresses the total size of the update.
## Examples The following code example uses <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.UpdateAvailable%2A> to determine if there is a new application update, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.IsUpdateRequired%2A> to determine whether to ask the user to install the update.
[!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets the version number of the latest uninstalled version.
Docs.value: The expressing the major, minor, build and revision numbers of the latest version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You can use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.AvailableVersion%2A> to decide whether to install the update based on the severity of the update. For example, if only the <xref:System.Version.Build%2A> or <xref:System.Version.Revision%2A> version properties have changed, your application may not need to update until either the <xref:System.Version.Minor%2A> or <xref:System.Version.Major%2A> properties change.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the update must be installed.
Docs.value: if the update is required; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you deploy an update to your ClickOnce application, you can mark it as a required update, signaling to your application that it should upgrade immediately. You want mark the update if the latest version contains a critical update, or if it is incompatible with file formats or back-end data sources used by the former version.
## Examples The following code example uses <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.IsUpdateRequired%2A> to determine whether to ask the user to install the update, or to install it without prompting.
[!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets the minimum version that the user must have installed on the computer.
Docs.value: A object expressing the earliest version that all users must install.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Applications can miss required updates when a user takes on a special assignment or is away from the computer for weeks or months. Use
<xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.MinimumRequiredVersion%2A> to determine if the user has not upgraded the application in a while, and has missed one or more required updates.
## Examples The following code example calls <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync%2A>, and forces an application update if <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.MinimumRequiredVersion%2A> is greater than <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentVersion%2A>.
[!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#10)]

Docs.summary: Gets whether an uninstalled update is available.
Docs.value: if new version of the application is available; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example inspects <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs.UpdateAvailable%2A> to determine whether or not there is an update to install.
[!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets the size of the available update.
Docs.value: An describing the size, in bytes, of the available update. If no update is available, returns 0.
